name: Shoot for the Stars (ldonelan98)
description:
ORIGINAL POST FROM TEAMMATE HERE: https://nickam521.itch.io/shoot-for-the-stars

Have you ever felt that life was meaningless and that you just want to shoot all of your anger into the void in a flurry of bullets whilst simultaneously pulling your hair out? Good, press space. 

Controls:
Click for menu, 'Spacebar' for everything else, 'Escape' if things go horribly wrong.

This was made for the 2 color game jam. "You are the weapon" and "Space" were the themes. We made it in space AND you use the space bar, so thats like 2x theme points right?
